description: This Suffolk village is located just north of Ipswich on the River Gipping. This waterside walk from the village takes you north along the Gipping Valley River Path to Needham Market where you can visit the pretty Needham Lake. The riverside waymarked path is one of the walking highlights of the area and a great way to explore the countryside. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Claydon. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
